text: Sweet Female Attitude was a UK garage and R&B; girl group, consisting of Leanne Brown and Catherine Cassidy, who are considered a one-hit wonder in the United Kingdom. The group's debut single "Flowers" was an instant hit and reached number two on the UK charts. Their follow up single "8 Days a Week" didn't reach the same success as "Flowers" and missed the top 40 and peaked at 43 on the charts. Their album In Person was only released in Germany. ==Discography== *In Person (2001) ==References== Category:English R&B; bands Category:British girl groups Category:Musical groups established in 1998 Category:1998 establishments in England Category:2002 disestablishments in the United Kingdom Category:Musical groups disestablished in 2002 Category:2000s disestablishments in England Category:Musical groups from Manchester
title: Sweet Female Attitude
